# Make A Repeating Time Block

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/make-a-repeating-time-block/

## Category
02 Calendar And Appointments

## Subcategory
Time Blocks

## Article Content

HOME
CALENDAR & APPOINTMENTS
TIME BLOCKS
Create a Repeating Time Block

To create a repeating time block, select an existing time block on the calendar, or create a new time block. The time block must be within one year from the current date.

Select Make Repeating from the "..." menu.

Enable the Repeat this time block toggle. Select a frequency and select Save.

The time block will continue repeating unless it is stopped. On the calendar, one year of repeating time blocks will be displayed at a time.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
